item.title: Payment needs repairs., 16th September
item.description:
This picture is taken of the pavement in Overhill Way (near 21 Bushy Way) Beckenham. It shows two areas that need mending: First: The payment has dropped leaving an area where water collects, but does not drain (but evaporates over time). Which in winter will be walking on ice. Second: In the foreground is a faded white cross (some other white crosses have warm away over time). These white crosses show repairs that should have been undertaken a long time ago. Please note that the payment has detreated further since the white crosses were added. Please give instructions to rectify the above problems.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2a, Overhill Way, Park Langley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked (new) drain. 30 Durham Road., 16th September
item.description:
